faaliyetAlanlari: Printing You can be sure of top quality service, support and sales from Sabur Digital. We offer Direct to Film (DTF), Sublimation, UV, UVDTF, Resin, Eco-solvent and Direct to Textile printers – all supported with more than 25 years’ experience.

Cutting Put profits up and bring costs down with a world-class cutter that’s got all the backing and support of a market-leader. IECHO. Customers tell us IECHO cutters are growing their business, so browse the iECHO range, and explore other cutting solutions like NEOLT’s XY Cutter, too.

Finishing Fast start-up, low running costs, easy to use – and consistent temperature. That’s what you want in Heat Presses and Calender Presses. Better results guaranteed, with the support of a team that knows the Diferro, Klieverik, and Sefa machines, inside-out.
